ARABIC: وَإِن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا نَحْنُ مُهْلِكُوهَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ أَوْ مُعَذِّبُوهَا عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا كَانَ ذَٰلِكَ فِى ٱلْكِتَٰبِ مَسْطُورًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There is no city We will not destroy before the Day of Rising, or punish with a terrible punishment. That is inscribed in the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is not a habitation We shall not destroy before the Day of Resurrection, or not inflict severe punishment upon it. This is in accordance with the law (of God).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There is not a town but We shall destroy it or upon which We shall inflict severe chastisement before the Day of Resurrection. This is written down in the Eternal Book (of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The decree that all the towns were to be destroyed or afflicted with severe punishment was already written in the Book before the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And there is no such dwelling but which We shall destroy before the Day of Resurrection, or punish it severely; this is written in the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And there is not a town (population) but We shall destroy it before the Day of Resurrection, or punish it with a severe torment. That is written in the Book (of Our decrees)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And there is not a town but We will destroy it before the day of resurrection or chastise it with a severe chastisement; this is written in the Divine ordinance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No city is there, but We shall destroy it before the Day of Resurrection, or We shall chastise it with a terrible chastisement; that is in the Book inscribed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There is not a township but We shall destroy it ere the Day of Resurrection, or punish it with dire punishment. That is set forth in the Book (of Our decrees).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: there is not a town [community] but We shall destroy or sternly punish it before the Day of Judgement. That is recorded in the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Not a town is there but VVe are going to destroy it before the Day of Judgment or to torment it With a severe torment; that is in the Book inscribed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is not a town but We will destroy it before the Day of Resurrection, or punish it with a severe punishment. That has been written in the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: There is not a population but We shall destroy it before the Day of Judgment or punish it with a dreadful Penalty: that is written in the (eternal) Record.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And there is not a town (population) but We shall destroy it before the Day of Resurrection, or punish it with a severe torment. That is written in the Book (of our Decrees)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There is no village except that it shall be destroyed or that We will punish it with a stern punishment before the Day of Resurrection. That is inscribed in theBook.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: There is no city but We will destroy before the Day of Resurrection, or punish it with a severe punishment. This is inscribed in the Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And there is no city but that We will destroy it before the Day of Resurrection or punish it with a severe punishment. That has ever been in the Register inscribed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:58] There is not a town — its inhabitants are the ones meant — but We shall destroy it before the Day of Resurrection, through death, or chastise it with terrible chastisement, by killing [its inhabitants] or otherwise. That has been inscribed in the Book, the Preserved Tablet (al-lawh al-mahfūz).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There is not a township but We shall destroy it) We shall destroy its people (ere the Day of Resurrection, or punish it with dire punishment) with the sword and diseases. (That) destruction and torment (is set forth in the Book (of Our decrees)) is written in the Guarded Tablet.
